scripts.generate: lerna run definitions --scope=@rc-ex/code-generator && lerna run paths --scope=@rc-ex/code-generator && gts fix
scripts.reset: lerna exec 'rm -rf lib' && lerna clean -y && lerna bootstrap
scripts.compile: lerna exec 'rm -rf lib' && lerna exec tsc --no-private
scripts.all: yarn upgrade-all && yarn reset && yarn prepublishOnly
